quotes.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
If you're doing well, you're aÂ target, nobody's interested in you except how you can be of use to them.
You must not only aim right, but draw your bow with all your might.Â
You will never be able to hit a target that you cannot see.
You too, can determine what you want. You can decide on your major objectives, targets, aims, and destinations.
It's a bizarre but wonderful feeling, to arrive dead center of aÂ targetÂ you didn't even know you were aiming for.
There is always a path to our target; the problem is to discover it!
TheÂ odds of hitting your target go up dramaticallyÂ when you aim at it.
A goal properly set is halfway reached.
Never reduce a target.Â Instead,Â increase actions!
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
Give time for a worthy cause with eagerness and you will be worthy and richly rewarded.
You have to set goals that are almost out of reach. If you set a goal that is attainable without much work or thought, you are stuck with something below your true talent and potential.
With your entire focus on your goal, you will reach levels of achievement that you never thought possible.
You can do anything if you set goals.Â You just have to push yourself.
Whenever you want to achieve something, keep your eyes open, concentrate and make sure you know exactly what it is you want. No one can hit their target with their eyes closed.
To reach a great height, a person needs to have great depth.
Aim for the moon, if you miss, you may hit a star.
You can't hit a target if you don't know what it is.
HighÂ aimsÂ form high characters, and great objects bring out great minds.
You can't hit a target unless you are aiming for it, and you can't achieve a goal without having it.
You should set goals beyond your reach so you always have something to live for.
If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
Be sure you positively identify your target before you pull the trigger.
Aim high. You may still miss theÂ targetÂ but at least you won't shoot your foot off.
The target of anything in life should be to do it so well that it becomes an art.
When I look down the range at theÂ targetÂ all I can do is try to distinguish between the different colors.
Set your target and keep trying until you reach it.
To be sure of hitting theÂ target, shoot first, and, whatever you hit, call it theÂ target.
By recording your dreams and goals on paper, you set in motion the process ofÂ becoming the person you most want to be.Put your future in good handsâ€”your own.
